parameters.name: CertifyId
parameters.description: Certificate ID, used for whitelisting this specific authenticated user.

parameters.name: ServiceCode
parameters.description:
Service type:
- **antcloudauth**: Financial-grade real-person authentication.
- **cloudauthst** (discontinued): Enhanced real-person authentication.

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: Visitor's source IP address. No need to fill in, the system will automatically obtain it.

parameters.name: ValidDay
parameters.description: Number of valid days after creating the whitelist.
